purpose: To educate individuals on Large Language Models (LLMs) through structured roadmaps and interactive notebooks.
principle: Combines theoretical roadmaps with practical Jupyter Notebooks to provide hands-on learning experience in LLMs.
reusability: Open-source educational content that can be adapted or extended for personal learning or teaching purposes.
limitations: Focused primarily on LLMs, may require prior knowledge in machine learning for full comprehension.
name: llm-course
description: Course to get into Large Language Models (LLMs) with roadmaps and Colab notebooks.
highlight: Comprehensive educational resource for learning about Large Language Models with practical Colab notebooks.
